discharge_note:
Regarding your pet, Darth Vader,

I'm pleased to inform you that Darth Vader is doing much better since the last visit. The cough has stopped, and he has shown significant improvement by being more active, running, playing, and eating without any issues.

During the consultation, no new medications were prescribed for home care. If Darth Vader is currently on any existing medication, please continue following the previous directions.

It's essential to continue monitoring Darth Vader for any changes in behavior or health. If you notice any concerning signs or have any questions, please don't hesitate to contact us.

Keep up the good work in caring for Darth Vader, and we look forward to seeing his continued progress. Feel free to reach out if you need any further assistance or guidance.

Best regards,
